traits.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The psurlon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Psychic Crush
entries: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, taking 14 (2d10 + 3 damage) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
